home.title: Home Page
home.description: This is an example page of the template
home.welcome_description: This is the Home page of the template. You can customize this content according to your needs. The layout includes a responsive grid and example cards that you can modify or replace with your content.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: This is an example page for settings.

about.title: About
about.description: This is an example page of the template
about.description_long: This template provides a solid foundation for building desktop applications with Svelte and Tauri. It includes internationalization support, a clean UI with Tailwind CSS, and is ready to be customized for your specific needs.
